Chart3DStyle
INotifyPropertyChanged
public
ChartSharp.​Chart3DStyle

Defines the rendering style of a SurfaceChart.

Functions
Chart3DStyle
public Chart3DStyle()

Initializes all properties to their default values

Properties
BackgroundColor
public Color BackgroundColor { get; set }

The color of the background of the SurfaceChart.

Default Value

Colors.White

DrawAxis
public bool DrawAxis { get; set }

If true, axis are drawn in the SurfaceChart. If one of the three AxisStyle members is null, the axis is not rendered. E.g. if XAxisStyle and ZAxisStyle are defined, but YAxisStyle is null, only the X-Axis will be rendered.

Default Value

true

DrawGrid
public bool DrawGrid { get; set }

If true, a grid is drawn in the background of the SurfaceChart. If GridStyle is null, it will still be not rendered.

Default Value

true

GridStyle
public Grid3DStyle GridStyle { get; set }

The style of the grid of the SurfaceChart. See Grid3DStyle.

Default Value

Constructor of Grid3DStyle

PaddingX
public double PaddingX { get; set }

The distance in pixels from the left and right side of the border of the chart itself that are left empty.

Default Value

30

PaddingY
public double PaddingY { get; set }

The distance in pixels from the top and bottom side of the border of the chart itself that are left empty.

Default Value

30

SizeX
public double SizeX { get; set }

The actual size of a SurfaceChart in the X-Direction. The triple SizeX, SizeY and SizeZ form the three-dimensional aspect ratio of the chart.

Default Value

10

SizeY
public double SizeY { get; set }

The actual size of a SurfaceChart in the Y-Direction. The triple SizeX, SizeY and SizeZ form the three-dimensional aspect ratio of the chart.

Default Value

10

SizeZ
public double SizeZ { get; set }

The actual size of a SurfaceChart in the Z-Direction. The triple SizeX, SizeY and SizeZ form the three-dimensional aspect ratio of the chart.

Default Value

10

TitleColor
public Color TitleColor { get; set }

The color of the title (defined in SurfaceChart).

Default Value

Colors.Black

TitleFontSize
public double TitleFontSize { get; set }

The size of the font of the title of the SurfaceChart. An exception can occur if this value is 0 or smaller.

Default Value

24

XAxisStyle
public AxisStyle XAxisStyle { get; set }

The style of the X-Axis. See AxisStyle.

Default Value

Constructor of AxisStyle

YAxisStyle
public AxisStyle YAxisStyle { get; set }

The style of the Y-Axis. See AxisStyle.

Default Value

Constructor of AxisStyle

ZAxisStyle
public AxisStyle ZAxisStyle { get; set }

The style of the Z-Axis. See AxisStyle.

Default Value

Constructor of AxisStyle
